reviewText: Too dark for me, but if you're into dark comedy this would be for you.
bloody over the top swear words are best used to describe this movie
This is a classic European dark comedy. If you know or are learning German, it is great practice. But even if you aren't, you can easily follow the subtitles. Very entertaining.
I watch a ton of movies in German, and this movie by far was the most disappointing.  No plot, action is poor, acting is poor.  I would not recommend buying this movie.

I had to buy this movie for a family member after seeing it.  It's in German with English subtitles, and the German makes it better!  Very dark humor involved.  This is a great movie to watch if you're studying German.
